Game Projects

Iron Testament

Lead Programmer

An upcoming turn-based-strategy game that takes place in a post-apocolyptic future. As the last surviving human on Earth, lead your robot followers and take back Earth for the Children of Flesh.

Donuts!

Game Designer

Donuts! is an upcoming arcade racer that combines the game loop of Crazy Taxi with the trick system of Tony Hawk while telling a story about the Cambodian-American experience.

Rat Pack

UI Engineer & Programmer

A fun little fighting game featuring members of Rat Economy
